Recipe.title: Dutch Oven Apple-Berry Crumble
Recipe.Description: We had been trying to find something that is as easy to make as the traditional "Crispy" but tastes a little better. After surprisingly few attempts, we came up with this dish.

section.instruction: Empty cans of Apple Pie Filling into the Dutch Oven.
Add Blueberries and Orange Zest then gently mix.
Smooth Filling until it covers the bottom of the Dutch Oven evenly.
Sift together all Topping ingredients, except for Butter.
Sprinkle Topping over Filling, then gently smooth it until even.
Slice sticks of Butter thinly and set around on top of Topping.
Heat top of Dutch Oven until Butter melts. If needed, spread Butter to make sure all of Topping absorbs some.
Slowly cook, with a small amount of heat on the bottom and a moderate amount of heat on the top, until Topping begins to turn a golden brown.
Reduce heat on top and add heat to bottom and cook until Filling just begins to bubble up.

Modifications.modification: For people with Diabetes, the Apple Pie Filling can be a No-Sugar-Added variety.
